title: The effects of distance in local versus remote human-computer interaction
proctitle: CHI '98: Proceedings of the SIGCHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems

authors.name: Youngme Moon
authors.institution: Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Room 14E-303, Cambridge, MA

references.text: Kerckhoff A. C. (1974). The social context of interpersonal attraction. In T. L. Huston (Ed.), Foundations of interpersonal attraction. New York: Academic Press.
